name: Summer Daze at Hero-U
description:
The Story: Summer Daze at Hero-U is a light-hearted interactive tale of friendship, fun, and folly suitable for all ages. It's up to you to save the upcoming Harvest Festival at Hero University from imminent disaster... or make it even worse! Will you forge life-long friendships? Will you be the hero, or will you be expelled from Hero-U? It all depends on how you play the game.

Gameplay: Summer Daze is an interactive story game that changes through your choices. You play as the studious Wizard Ifeyo or the mischieveous Rogue Tilly. Your choices will help you make friends, have exciting adventures, and help the Harvest Festival succeed (or fail gloriously). This is a dialogue-driven point-and-click game with choice menus and an interactive game map.

The Team: Corey and Lori Cole, the husband and wife team behind Transolar Games, have designed many great games including the Quest for Glory series, Castle of Dr. Brain, and Hero-U: Rogue to Redemption. With the support of their talented development teams and devoted fans, they continue to create role-playing, adventure, and story-telling games full of lore, mystery, wonder, and beauty.
